definition: belonging to the present time, a person of nearly the same age as another
details:
adjective
- belonging to the present time
= example: belonging to the present time
= synonyms: present-day
- characteristic of the present
= example: characteristic of the present
= synonyms: modern-day, modern day
- occurring in the same period of time
= synonyms: contemporaneous
noun
- a person of nearly the same age as another
= synonyms: coeval
